ObjectStates.Name: Die_6
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
spawnTime = 0

function onLoad()

    color = self.held_by_color
    if color != nil then
        colorRGB = stringColorToRGB(color)
        self.setColorTint(colorRGB)
    end

    notecard = getObjectFromGUID('d8fbc5')
    d6die = getObjectFromGUID(self.guid)
    itHasApparentlyRolled = false

    oldRotation = self.getRotation()

    notTheFirstDrop = false
    spawnTime = os.clock()

end

function resetTimer()
    theTime = os.clock()
end

resetTimer()

function onCollisionStay(collision_info)

    currentRotation = self.getRotation()

    if collision_info.collision_object.tag ~= 'Dice' and notTheFirstDrop and self.resting and os.clock() - theTime > 1 and math.floor(currentRotation[1] + currentRotation[2] + currentRotation[3]) ~= math.floor(oldRotation[1] + oldRotation[2] + oldRotation[3]) then

        itHasApparentlyRolled = true

        currentRoll = self.getValue()

        notecard.call("reportRoll", { currentRoll })

        if itHasApparentlyRolled then
            itHasApparentlyRolled = false
            oldRotation = self.getRotation()
        end

        resetTimer()

    end

   if os.clock() - spawnTime > 3 and notTheFirstDrop == false then
        notTheFirstDrop = true
   end

end

ObjectStates.Name: Notecard
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
rollValues = {}
oldLines = {}
currentDescription = ''
currentLine = 0
isThisThingOn = true

function onLoad()

    notecard = getObjectFromGUID(self.guid)
    theZone = getObjectFromGUID('6c388d')
    self.setDescription('0')

end

function reportRoll(currentRoll)

    if isThisThingOn then

        local rollDisplay = ""
        local rollSum = 0
        local rollLine = ""

        notecard.SetDescription('')
        rollValues[#rollValues + 1] = currentRoll[1]

        for i,v in ipairs(rollValues) do
            rollSum = rollSum + rollValues[i]
        end

        for i,v in ipairs(rollValues) do

            rollLine = rollLine .. " + " .. rollValues[i]

            if #rollValues > 1 then
                currentLine = rollLine .. ' = ' .. rollSum
            else
                currentLine = rollLine
            end

            currentLine = string.sub(currentLine, 4)
            notecard.setDescription(currentDescription .. currentLine)

        end

    end

end

function reportMultiplier(currentRoll)

    if isThisThingOn then

        local rollDisplay = ""
        local rollSum = 0
        local rollLine = ""
        local rollMultiplied = 0

        notecard.SetDescription('')
        -- rollValues[#rollValues + 1] = currentRoll[1]

        for i,v in ipairs(rollValues) do
            rollSum = rollSum + rollValues[i]
        end

        for i,v in ipairs(rollValues) do

            rollLine = rollLine .. " + " .. rollValues[i]

            if currentRoll[1] >= 0 then
                currentLine = rollLine .. ') \u{00D7} ' .. currentRoll[1] .. ' = ' .. rollSum * currentRoll[1]
            end
            if currentRoll[1] < 0 then
                currentLine = rollLine .. ') \u{2215} ' .. math.abs(currentRoll[1]) .. ' = ' .. rollSum / math.abs(currentRoll[1])
            end

            currentLine = string.sub(currentLine, 4)
            currentLine = '(' .. currentLine

            notecard.setDescription(currentDescription .. currentLine)

        end

    end

end

function clearTheCard()
    self.setDescription('0')
    rollValues = {}
    currentDescription = ''
    oldLines = {}
end


function carriageReturn()
    oldLines[#oldLines + 1] = currentLine
    currentDescription = ''

    if #oldLines > 9 then
        table.remove(oldLines,1)
    end

    for i,v in ipairs(oldLines) do
        currentDescription = currentDescription .. oldLines[i] .. '\n'
    end

    currentLine = 0
    currentRoll = 0
    rollValues = {}

    notecard.setDescription(currentDescription .. currentLine)

end

function onOff()
    if isThisThingOn then
        isThisThingOn = false
    else
        isThisThingOn = true
    end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
m1 = 0
m2 = 0
m3 = 0

function onLoad ()

    buttonSpawn (0, 'm1', -7.8, 0.2, 0)
    buttonSpawn (3, 'm2', -3.5, 0.2, 0)
    buttonSpawn (6, 'm3', 1.4, 0.2, 0) -- 0.8 for flush left

    clearButtonSpawn (9, 'C', 7.1, 0.2, 0)
    returnButtonSpawn (10, 'Enter', 8.9, 0.2, 0)
    onOffButtonSpawn (11, 'onOffButton', 5.3, 0.2, 0)

    notecard = getObjectFromGUID('d8fbc5')
    -- self.interactable = false

end

function buttonSpawn (index, name, x, y, z)

    local scale = 7
    local fontScale = 4

    local name = {}
    name.click_function = 'report_func'..index

    if index == 6 then
        name.label = '\u{00D7}'
        name.font_size = 120 * 7
    else
        name.label = '0'
        name.font_size = 120 * 4
    end

    name.function_owner = self
    name.position = {x, y, z}
    name.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
    name.width = 110 * scale
    name.height = 110 * scale
    self.createButton(name)

    local plus = {}
    plus.click_function = 'plus_func'..index
    plus.label = '+'
    plus.function_owner = self
    plus.position = {x+0.2 * scale, y, z}
    plus.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
    plus.width = 60 * scale
    plus.height = 60 * scale
    plus.font_size = 100 * scale
    self.createButton(plus)

    local minus = {}
    minus.click_function = 'minus_func'..index
    minus.label = '\u{2212}'
    minus.function_owner = self
    minus.position = {x-0.2 * scale, y, z}
    minus.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
    minus.width = 60 * scale
    minus.height = 60 * scale
    minus.font_size = 100 * scale
    self.createButton(minus)

end

function clearButtonSpawn (index, name, x, y, z)
    local scale = 7
    local fontScale = 4
    local name = {}
    name.click_function = 'clearTheCard'
    name.label = 'C'
    name.function_owner = self
    name.position = {x, y, z}
    name.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
    name.width = 110 * scale
    name.height = 110 * scale
    name.font_size = 120 * fontScale
    self.createButton(name)
end

function returnButtonSpawn (index, name, x, y, z)
    local scale = 7
    local fontScale = 7
    local name = {}
    name.click_function = 'carriageReturn'
    name.label = '\u{21B5}'
    name.function_owner = self
    name.position = {x, y, z}
    name.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
    name.width = 110 * scale
    name.height = 110 * scale
    name.font_size = 120 * fontScale
    self.createButton(name)
end

function onOffButtonSpawn (index, name, x, y, z)
    local scale = 7
    local fontScale = 7
    local name = {}
    name.click_function = 'onOff_func'
    name.label = '\u{2611}'
    name.function_owner = self
    name.position = {x, y, z}
    name.rotation = {0, 0, 0}
    name.width = 110 * scale
    name.height = 110 * scale
    name.font_size = 120 * fontScale
    self.createButton(name)
end


function plus_func0 ()
    m1 = m1 + 1
    local button = {}
    button.index = 0
    button.label = m1
    self.editButton(button)
end

function minus_func0 ()
    m1 = m1 - 1
    local button = {}
    button.index = 0
    button.label = m1
    self.editButton(button)
end

function report_func0 ()
    notecard.call("reportRoll", { m1 })
end

function plus_func3 ()
    m2 = m2 + 1
    local button = {}
    button.index = 3
    button.label = m2
    self.editButton(button)
end

function minus_func3 ()
    m2 = m2 - 1
    local button = {}
    button.index = 3
    button.label = m2
    self.editButton(button)
end

function report_func3 ()
    notecard.call("reportRoll", { m2 })
end



function plus_func6 ()
    m3 = m3 + 1
    local button = {}
    button.index = 6
    button.label = m3

    if m3 == 0 then
        button.font_size = 120 * 7
        button.label = '\u{00D7}'
    elseif m3 > 0 then
        button.font_size = 120 * 4
        button.label = '\u{00D7}' .. m3
    elseif m3 < 0 then
        button.font_size = 120 * 4
        button.label = '\u{00F7}' .. math.abs(m3)
    end

    self.editButton(button)
end

function minus_func6 ()
    m3 = m3 - 1
    local button = {}
    button.index = 6

    if m3 == 0 then
        button.font_size = 120 * 7
        button.label = '\u{00D7}'
    elseif m3 > 0 then
        button.font_size = 120 * 4
        button.label = '\u{00D7}' .. m3
    elseif m3 < 0 then
        button.font_size = 120 * 4
        button.label = '\u{00F7}' .. math.abs(m3)
    end

    self.editButton(button)
end

function report_func6 ()
    notecard.call("reportMultiplier", { m3 })
end


function clearTheCard()
    notecard.call("clearTheCard")
end

function carriageReturn()
    notecard.call("carriageReturn")
end

function onOff_func()

    local isThisThingOn = notecard.getVar("isThisThingOn")
    local button = {}
    button.index = 11

    if isThisThingOn then
        button.label = '\u{2610}'
    else
        button.label = '\u{2611}'
    end

    self.editButton(button)

    notecard.call("onOff")

end
